Header: 12 Division GOC Takes Leave of His Troops
Content: The outgoing General officer Commanding 12 Division Major General N.D Wanniarachchi to take over his new appointment as the Adjutant General in the Army Headquarters took leave of his troops at the 12 Division Headquarters in Hambantota on Monday (14). A Guard Turnout and a parade presented by 18 Gemunu Watch troops saluted him before he addressed the troops and joined a sapling planting. 121 Brigade Commander, 122 Brigade Commander, Senior Officer of the 12 Division, Commanding Officers of under Command battalions, officers and other rankers attended.
